com.plexobject.dp.util

Class ObjectConversionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plexobject.dp.util.ObjectConversionUtils

  • public class ObjectConversionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines methods for converting objects into primitive data types such as long, text
